text: Over Tissa () is a 1958 Soviet thriller movie directed by Dmitri Vasilyev.НАД ТИССОЙФильмы о любимых предателях It stars Valentin Zubkov, Athanasius Kochetkov, and Tatyana Konyukhova. ==Actors== *Valentin Zubkov – "Ivan Belogray", aka Clark, enemy saboteur *Athanasius Kochetkov – Andrei Ivanovich Smolyarchuk, foreman of the border troops *Tatyana Konyukhova – Theresa Simak *Nina Nikitina – Maria Vasilyevna Simak, Theresa's mother *Andrey Yanovich Goncharov – Shaposhnikov, captain of the border troops *Alexander Khvylya – Gromada, general of the border guards == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1958 crime movies Category:1950s thriller movies Category:Russian crime movies Category:Russian thriller movies Category:Soviet thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Dmitri Vasilyev
title: Over Tissa
